document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">fight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">aloud, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">very </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">brave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">gallanter, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">charge </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">within </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">bosom </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Cavalry </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Wo </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">win, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">nations </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">fall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">none </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">observe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">eyes, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Country </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Regards </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">patriot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">trust, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">plumed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">procession </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Angels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Rank </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">after </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Rank, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">even </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Uniforms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">snow. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: To fight aloud is very brave
